pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Wednesday, November 11, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

10:45 a.m. The Prime Minister and Sophie Grégoire Trudeau will participate in the National Remembrance Day Ceremony. Minister of Veterans Affairs and Associate Minister of National Defence Lawrence MacAulay will be in attendance.

Due to limited space and physical distancing requirements, spectators are asked to observe the ceremony from home and not attend in person.

National War Memorial

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for accredited media
  • Media should arrive no later than 10:00 a.m.

Media appearance

11:30 a.m.  A prerecorded interview with the the Prime Minister will air as part of the Financial Times Global Boardroom event. Viewers can register to watch the interview via the following link: https://globalboardroom.ft.com/
